span.title: Base StructureDefinition for dateTime Type: A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month). If hours and minutes are specified, a time zone SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored. Dates SHALL be valid dates.

span.title: Base StructureDefinition for id type: Any combination of letters, numerals, "-" and ".", with a length limit of 64 characters. (This might be an integer, an unprefixed OID, UUID or any other identifier pattern that meets these constraints.) Ids are case-insensitive.

title.value: Cross-version Extension `R5.EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromEvent` for use in FHIR R4

description.value: This cross-version extension represents the FHIR R5 element `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromEvent` for use in FHIR R4.

purpose.value:
This extension is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the element `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromEvent` as defined in FHIR R5 in FHIR R4.
The source element is defined as: `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromEvent` 0..* `BackboneElement`
Across FHIR versions, the element set has been mapped as: * R5: `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromEvent` 0..* `BackboneElement` * R4B: `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromStart` 0..1 `BackboneElement` * R4: `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromStart` 0..1 `Duration`
Following are the generation technical comments: Element `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromEvent` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromStart` as `SourceIsBroaderThanTarget`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`. Note available implied context: `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definitionByCombination.characteristic.timeFromStart` because `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definitionByCombination.characteristic` is defined via a content reference to `EvidenceVariable.characteristic`.

short.value: Timing in which the characteristic is determined

definition.value: Timing in which the characteristic is determined.

short.value: Human readable description

definition.value: Human readable description.

requirements.value: Element `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromEvent.description` has a context of EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromStart based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `EvidenceVariable`. Note available implied context: `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definitionByCombination.characteristic.timeFromStart` because `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definitionByCombination.characteristic` is defined via a content reference to `EvidenceVariable.characteristic`.
